title: Keerai Dosa Recipe, Spinach Dosa for babies, Toddlers & Kids
content:
Healthy spinach dosa which tastes so yummy and is so nutritious for your baby. This dosa is a green color with tons of health benefits in them.

This is an easy way to include spinach in your toddler or kid's diet. They will never find it and still, they will enjoy eating green dosa.

 

Spinach Dosa for Babies, Toddlers & Kids

 

Preparation time

5 mins

Cook time

5 mins

Total time

10 mins

 

Recipe type: Breakfast

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 1 serving

Ingredients

Dosa Batter - 1 cup

Spinach Puree - 3 tablespoon

Ghee or oil as needed

 

Instructions

Mix batter with spinach puree.

Heat a pan, make dosa. Drizzle with oil or ghee. Cook till golden and flip.

Serve.

recommendations.content: Barley makes the best first food for babies. Since it is less allergenic and it is quite filling too. recommendations.title: Beetroot milk Recipe, Rose milk using Beetroots
recommendations.content:
Delicious rose milk made using beetroots. This is healthy for kids and toddlers. Instead of giving normal rose milk with lots of food coloring, you can give this beet milk.
